name: 3D Commando Sniper Hunter Surv
description:
3D Commando Sniper Hunter Survival brings an incredible action game of escape and advanced counter-evil terrorist attack shot in this call of sniper duty frontline shooting hunter game. You must survive difficult shooting missions that is full of critical combat attack and advanced weaponry. Show off your superiority shooting skills, just like the superheroes in this critical fight shooting attack.
*key features*
Wide variety of weapons to shoot
Real guns and snipers to kill the enemies
Be a best sniper of the history
Assault with full force to save the city
Stunning 3D graphics and best audio effects
